mapper.insert: insert into poetry_table(poetry_id,name, author, content, addition_info, class_info,class_info_explain, main_class,main_class_explain, source,source_explain, transfer_info,likes) values ( #{poetry_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addition_info,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{class_info,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{class_info_explain,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{main_class,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{main_class_explain,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source_explain,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transfer_info,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select poetry_id,name,author,content,likes,pt.class_info,bt.class_info,bt.image_base_url,bt.origin_url,class_info_explain,main_class,main_class_explain,source,source_explain,text_color from poetry_table pt left join bgImage_table bt on pt.class_info = bt.class_info where 1=1 order by likes desc limit #{from_index},#{count}

select poetry_id,name,author,content,likes,pt.class_info,bt.class_info,bt.image_base_url,bt.origin_url,class_info_explain,main_class,main_class_explain,source,source_explain,text_color from poetry_table pt left join bgImage_table bt on pt.class_info = bt.class_info where pt.main_class = #{main_class} order by pt.poetry_id desc

select poetry_id,name,author,content,likes,class_info,class_info_explain,main_class,main_class_explain,source,source_explain,text_color,transfer_info from poetry_table where main_class = #{main_class} order by poetry_id desc
